items.title: HTTP Server in C
items.description: Implementation of a basic HTTP server in C from scratch, handling socket opening, connection management and HTTP responses.

items.title: MonkeeChess - Online multiplayer chess game
items.description: Development of an online multiplayer chess game using Django and WebSocket channels for real-time communication.

items.title: SecureBox - Secure password management application
items.description: Desktop application developed in Python with Tkinter that allows users to securely store and manage their passwords using AES-256 encryption in GCM mode.

items.title: AutoGrader (LLMs)
items.description: Final degree project for Computer Engineering. Platform that allows lecturers to create programming exercises and automatically evaluate students' solutions using large language models (LLMs).

items.title: RtsWeb - Web-based strategy game
items.description: Development of a real-time strategy (RTS) browser-based game using the Unity engine and C#.
